    ReLTER

    ReLTER.Rmd

    Citation of ReLTER

    To cite ReLTER please use: Alessandro Oggioni. (2021). oggioniale/ReLTER: v0.3.0 (0.3.0). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5576813

    or:

    @software{alessandro_oggioni_2021_5576814,
  author       = {Alessandro Oggioni},
  title        = {oggioniale/ReLTER: v0.3.0},
  month        = oct,
  year         = 2021,
  publisher    = {Zenodo},
  version      = {0.2.0},
  doi          = {10.5281/zenodo.5576813},
  url          = {https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5576813}
}

    Documentation of ReLTER

    You can visit ReLTER website at oggioniale.github.io/ReLTER/ for obtain documentation about installation and examples of use.

    Installation of ReLTER

    You can install the development version of ReLTER from GitHub with:

    install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("oggioniale/ReLTER")
